name: XWUI Spinner Component
description: Loading spinner component with overlay option. Displays an animated spinner for loading states. Supports various sizes, colors, overlay mode with optional blur effect, and label text.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

overlay.description: Whether to show overlay behind spinner

blur.description: Whether to blur background when overlay is enabled

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the spinner

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

label.description: Label text to display with the spinner

spinning.description: Whether the spinner is currently spinning
